means: 推动、推进或敦促某人做某事

sentence.Network_en: Information construction is a necessary tool to impel strategy implementation.
sentence.Network_cn: 信息化建设是推动战略实施的必要工具.

sentence.Network_en: Reinvigorating democratic spirit is helpful to impel the development of contemporary design.
sentence.Network_cn: 重振民主主义精神有助于推动当代艺术设计的发展.

sentence.Network_en: My final goal is to impel the China's renaissance!
sentence.Network_cn: 我的最终目的是推动中华民族屹立于世界民族之林!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... immanacle 加以手铐 impel 推动，驱使 imbrute 堕落，使成禽兽.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... impede 阻碍 impel 驱使,逼迫 imperil 危及,使陷于危机.
expel v 开除，驱逐impel v 推进，驱动●dispel v 驱散（烟雾等）●
...ain / tenacious : persist(有节制的[人]抑制/ 顽强的[人]坚持)反义词：impel(推动)(例) The doctors restrained the patient hurting him.

柴油机零部件术语（英文） - 豆丁网 ... 导风轮 inducer 8. 11 . 压气机叶轮 compressor impeller 8. 1 2. 涡轮 turbine 9 8. 1 3.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'propel'): from Latin impellere, from in- 'towards' + pellere 'to drive'

entry.def: When something such as an emotion impels you to do something, it affects you so strongly that you feel forced to do it.

example.ex: ...the courage and competitiveness which impels him to take risks...
example.tran: 促使他冒险的勇气和竞争精神

example.ex: I felt impelled to go on speaking.
example.tran: 我感到不得不继续说下去。

means.word_mean: 1. urge or force (a person) to an action; constrain or motivate
2. cause to move forward with force;

auth_sentence.content: Food shortages impel many residents to flee to mainland China.
auth_sentence.res_content: Food shortages impel many residents to flee to mainland China.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Food shortages impel many residents to flee to mainland China.

auth_sentence.content: Just as hunger impels a person to eat, so does dissonance impel a person to change his opinions or his behavior.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just as hunger impels a person to eat, so does dissonance impel a person to change his opinions or his behavior.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just as hunger impels a person to eat, so does dissonance impel a person to change his opinions or his behavior.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 引起兴趣的,引人注目的;强制的, 强迫的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compel[v.强迫,迫使]+ing表形容词→compelling强迫的→[某事或物]迫使其注意→引人注目的
propel[v.推进]+er表名词→propeller螺旋桨
com共同+pel驱动,推→一起推→强迫
dis分开+pel推→推开→驱除
ex出+pel推→推出去→逐出
im进入+pel推→推进,驱动
pro向前+pel推→向前推
re回+pel推→击退

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+mortal死的→adj.不朽的
im不,无,非+mutable可变的→adj.不变的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+polite礼貌的→adj.无礼的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

means.word_mean: 推动、推进或敦促某人做某事

sentences.en: I feel impelled to express grave doubts about the project.
sentences.cn: 我觉得不得不对这项计划深表怀疑。

sentences.en: Faith that justice would prevail impelled us forward.
sentences.cn: 正义必胜的信念激励着我们前进。

sentences.en: I was so annoyed that I felt impelled to write a letter to the paper.
sentences.cn: 我非常恼怒, 以致觉得非给报社写信不可。
